extendedInfo.description: All new Pixel Puzzle is a fun, free, and addicting update on the classic pixel flood puzzle game. It's simple! the goal is to flood the entire board with one color by pressing the color buttons at the bottom. Challenge yourself by competing against your best score, or with challenge mode, you can compete against the clock with limited moves. Each puzzle is randomly generated making sure that you have a different experience time.  There are hundreds of random fun and colorful images to reveal as you complete each puzzle. Play for FREE!Features:* 2 different modes so you can relax and enjoy the game or compete against the clock.* Randomly generates puzzles for unlimited game-play.* Automatically saves your scores and achievements* Fun pictures to reveal with each puzzle* Free fun for hours!

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Love these kind of games. best one out there i have seen
reviews.author: Tom Lorenz

reviews.title: Awasomely Challengeing
reviews.comment: It was realy cool to see the final product come to together. And everyone should try it of they love games like this than this is the ONE new game they will love
reviews.author: Hunter Costine
